title: (1) Oberwesel, Looking Upstream, Showing St Martin’s Church, the Ochsturm and Other Towers and Wernerkapelle; (2) Oberwesel, Looking Upstream, Showing the Schönburg, the Liebfrauenkirche and Wernerkapelle; (3) Oberwesel, Looking Upstream
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
